T02D2561:24a-1: de ltar skyabs 'gro khyad par can byas nas sems bskyed pa ni /
T02D2561:24a-2: thal mo sbyar la phyag 'tshal ba dang dad mchod
T02D2561:24a-3: pa'i las byas la pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga
T02D2561:24a-4: sa la btsugs te 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2561:24a-5: ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T02D2561:24a-6: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2561:24a-7: 'das rnams dang / sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i
T02D2561:24a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bla na med
T02D2561:24a-9: pa'i byang chub mchog tu rin po cher bskyed pa
T02D2561:24a-10: ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas byang chub mchog
T02D2561:24a-11: tu sems bskyed pa'i sbyin pa rin po cher gzung
T02D2561:24a-12: du gsol zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo
T02D2561:24a-13: 'das rnams dang / // de nas 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2561:24a-14: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs su gsol /
T02D2561:24a-15: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba thog ma dang /
T02D2561:24a-16: skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa las byung ba dang /
T02D2561:24a-17: tshul khrims las byung ba dang /
T02D2561:24a-18: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis pa dang /
T02D2561:24a-20: bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des /
T02D2561:24a-21: ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T02D2561:24a-22: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang
T02D2561:24a-23: / sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2561:24a-24: dpa' rnams kyis thugs bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D2561:24a-25: mchog rin po cher sems bskyed pa de bzhin du
T02D2561:24a-26: / / bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang sems
T02D2561:24a-27: can ma smin pa rnams smin par bya ba dang
T02D2561:24a-28: / / / ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyid pa dang /
T02D2561:24a-29: dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang //
T02D2561:24a-30: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir //
T02D2561:24a-31: dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la
T02D2561:24a-32: mchis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag
T02D2561:24a-33: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o
T02D2561:24a-36: bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid //
T02D2561:24a-37: thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te //
T02D2561:24a-38: rga nad 'chi ba'i rba klod [?] 'khrugs pa yi //
T02D2561:24a-39: srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'dren par shog / dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun /
T02D2561:24b-0: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags @24b te ;
T02D2561:24b-1: / bsod nams ye shes las byung ba'i //
T02D2561:24b-2: dam pa gnyis ni thob par shog / sa 'am chu'am me'am rlung //
T02D2561:24b-3: dgon pa shing gi sman lta bur //
T02D2561:24b-4: bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2561:24b-5: nad do cog gi gsos su shog / mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang //
T02D2561:24b-6: dran pa dang ni reg pas kyang //
T02D2561:24b-7: bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2561:24b-8: gru dang zam pa lta bur shog / byang chub sems dpa' su dag gang bzhugs pa'i //
T02D2561:24b-9: de dag kun gyi smon lam grub gyur nas //
T02D2561:24b-10: sems can thams cad gtan du bde ba dang //
T02D2561:24b-11: ngan song rnams ni rtag tu stongs par shog / sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la //
T02D2561:24b-12: byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2561:24b-13: bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa 'di dag gis //
T02D2561:24b-14: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
T02D2561:24b-15: ces dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi
